prompt:
Nurse: Alright, if there are no further questions, I believe we've covered all the necessary topics for today. Before we end the call, do you have any other questions or concerns?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Alright, that was all the topics for today. Before we end the call, do you have any other questions or concerns you'd like to discuss?

Patient: Yeah.

Nurse: Of course, what's on your mind?

Patient: I said no.

Nurse: I apologize for misunderstanding. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss or any other questions you have?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: Great. To summarize, you still need to pick up your chlorhexidine scrub and your Oxycodone prescription, shower with the scrub the night before and the morning of the procedure, and remember not to eat or drink after midnight before your surgery. Can I count on you to do all of that?
responses.our_model: Alright, I appreciate your time today. To summarize, before your procedure, you'll need to pick up your chlorhexidine scrub and remember not to eat or drink anything after midnight. After your procedure, you'll need to have someone to drive you home and stay with you. Can I count on you to do all of this?
